sentences.sentence: The trug was of no effect.
Our company specializes in research & development, producing and selling automobile parts, such as door panel assembly , interior trim components pillar , package trug and air inlet grill .
sentences.translation: 公司主要从事汽车门板总成，落水槽，立柱等汽车零部件的研发、生产和销售。
